title: California, The Problem
prompt: A wide landscape shot of a California county road cutting through golden grassland at late afternoon light, with distant hills and a single utility pole marking the horizon; in the immediate foreground, weathered hands on a steering wheel visible through a truck window, suggesting a long drive to the nearest hospital; the palette dominated by ochre, sage, and dusty amber tones, with soft shadows lengthening across the road surface, conveying isolation and distance without sentimentality.
